lead_paragraph: The group’s opening leg at the Rose Studio featured three quartets by Bartok, with Beethoven and more Bartok to come.
snippet: The group’s opening leg at the Rose Studio featured three quartets by Bartok, with Beethoven and more Bartok to come.

headline.main: Review: Jerusalem Quartet Starts a Weeklong Marathon
headline.print_headline: Kicking Off  a Marathon With Bartok

keywords.name: organizations

abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by Jerusalem Quartet at  Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center's Rose Studio.
